content.rendered:
2023 Rose Bowl Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including three nights hotel stay, entry level tickets for the Rose Bowl, plus more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
HotelRoom CategoryRates From
Courtyard Pasadena / Old TownStandard Room$3,195
Westin PasadenaClassic Room$3,995
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
